H0.text: Technically a shoal of fish becomes a school of fish when it is. When they reach a certain size

H1.text: Technically a shoal of fish becomes a school of fish when it is. When they are feeding

H2.text: Technically a shoal of fish becomes a school of fish when it is. When they are breeding

H3.text: Technically a shoal of fish becomes a school of fish when it is. Swimming in the same direction

A4.text: If the shoal becomes more tightly organised, with the fish synchronising their swimming so they all move at the same speed and in the same direction, then the fish may be said to be schooling.

A5.text: When schooling fish stop to feed, they break ranks and become shoals.
